Description: Fragment of a blue faience amulet showing a standing female deity. Fragment shows the lower part of a wig, a pair of breasts, an arm clutching a staff and the upper part of the dress. The rear of the fragment is flat and smooth. In the brake of the upper part, a indendation can be observed, as if a perforation was started after the object broke.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D15.R, Mound β
